info.title: TenderTransaction
info.description: Each tender transaction represents money passing between the merchant and a customer. A tender transaction with a positive amount represents a transaction where the customer paid money to the merchant. A negative amount represents a transaction where the merchant refunded money back to the customer. Tender transactions represent transactions that modify the shop's balance.

paths.description: Retrieves a list of tender transactions. Note: As of version 2019-10, this endpoint implements pagination by using links that are provided in the response header. To learn more, see Make paginated requests to the REST Admin API.
paths.summary: Retrieves a list of tender transactions

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Show tender transactions ordered by processed_at in ascending or descending order.

parameters.name: processed_at
parameters.description: Show tender transactions processed at the specified date.

parameters.name: processed_at_max
parameters.description: Show tender transactions processed_at or before the specified date.

parameters.name: processed_at_min
parameters.description: Show tender transactions processed_at or after the specified date.

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Retrieve only transactions after the specified ID.

200.description: Retrieves a list of tender transactions

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/tender_transactions.json" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::TenderTransaction.all(
  session: test_session,
)

x-examples.name: Retrieve tender transactions after the specified ID

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/tender_transactions.json?since_id=1011222857" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::TenderTransaction.all(
  session: test_session,
  since_id: "1011222857",
)

curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/tender_transactions.json?order=processed_at+ASC" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::TenderTransaction.all(
  session: test_session,
  order: "processed_at ASC",
)

x-examples.name: Retrieve tender transactions processed_at or after the specified date

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/tender_transactions.json?processed_at_min=2005-08-06+10%3A22%3A51+-0400" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::TenderTransaction.all(
  session: test_session,
  processed_at_min: "2005-08-06 10:22:51 -0400",
)

x-examples.name: Retrieve tender transactions processed_at or before the specified date

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/tender_transactions.json?processed_at_max=2005-08-06+10%3A22%3A51+-0400" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::TenderTransaction.all(
  session: test_session,
  processed_at_max: "2005-08-06 10:22:51 -0400",
)

x-examples.name: Retrieve tender transactions processed_at the specified date

codeSamples.example_code:
curl -X GET "https://your-development-store.myshopify.com/admin/api/2022-10/tender_transactions.json?processed_at_max=2005-08-05+10%3A22%3A51+-0400" \
-H "X-Shopify-Access-Token: {access_token}"

test_session = ShopifyAPI::Utils::SessionUtils.load_current_session(
  auth_header: request.auth_header,
  cookies: request.cookies,
)

ShopifyAPI::TenderTransaction.all(
  session: test_session,
  processed_at_max: "2005-08-05 10:22:51 -0400",
)

properties.description: The ID of the order that the tender transaction belongs to.
properties.name: order_id

properties.description: The amount of the tender transaction in the shop's currency.
properties.name: amount

properties.description: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) for the currency used for the tender transaction.
properties.name: currency

properties.description: The ID of the user logged into the Shopify POS device that processed the tender transaction, if applicable.
properties.name: user_id

properties.description: Whether the tender transaction is a test transaction.
properties.name: test

properties.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the tender transaction was processed.
properties.name: processed_at

properties.description: The remote (gateway) reference associated with the tender.
properties.name: remote_reference

properties.description:
Information about the payment instrument used for this transaction. It has the following properties:
  • credit_card_company: The name of the company that issued the customer's credit card.
  • credit_card_number: The customer's credit card number, with most of the leading digits redacted.
properties.name: payment_details

properties.description:
Information about the payment method used for this transaction. Valid values:
  • credit_card
  • cash
  • android_pay
  • apple_pay
  • google_pay
  • samsung_pay
  • shopify_pay
  • amazon
  • klarna
  • paypal
  • unknown
  • other
properties.name: payment_method

x-shopify-meta.meta_description: Retrieve tender transactions for your shop. Tender transactions represent transactions that modify the shop's balance.
